unnormalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! Film buffs, gather 'round!
normalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! Film buffs, gather 'round!

unnormalised: The film festival circuit is buzzing right now. From Cannes to closer home in God's Own Country, Kerala, things are happening. Word on the street is that the International Film Festival of Kerala (IFFK) is gearing up for its annual edition, promising a cinematic feast for movie lovers.
normalised: The film festival circuit is buzzing right now. From Cannes to closer home in God's Own Country, Kerala, things are happening. Word on the street is that the International Film Festival of Kerala (I F F K) is gearing up for its annual edition, promising a cinematic feast for movie lovers.

unnormalised: Remember last year's gem, "Ariyippu" making waves? Expect similar indie darlings and global cinema to grace the screens.
normalised: Remember last year's gem, "Ariyippu" making waves? Expect similar indie darlings and global cinema to grace the screens.

unnormalised: But it's not just IFFK. Smaller, niche festivals are popping up all over, showcasing regional talents and diverse narratives. Think documentaries about village life in Rajasthan, short films exploring themes of identity in urban Mumbai, and everything in between.
normalised: But it's not just I F F K. Smaller, niche festivals are popping up all over, showcasing regional talents and diverse narratives. Think documentaries about village life in Rajasthan, short films exploring themes of identity in urban Mumbai, and everything in between.

unnormalised: And let’s be honest, no film festival experience is complete without a plate of delicious biryani afterwards, discussing the movie with friends over steaming rice and succulent meat! It's all part of the experience, right?
normalised: And let’s be honest, no film festival experience is complete without a plate of delicious biryani afterwards, discussing the movie with friends over steaming rice and succulent meat! It's all part of the experience, right?

unnormalised: Keep your eyes peeled for announcements and screening schedules. Support independent cinema, folks! You never know, you might just discover your next favourite filmmaker! It's truly an exciting time for Indian cinema. Happy watching!
normalised: Keep your eyes peeled for announcements and screening schedules. Support independent cinema, folks! You never know, you might just discover your next favourite filmmaker! It's truly an exciting time for Indian cinema. Happy watching!
